programme.title: Die Another Day
James Bond 007: Stirb an einem anderen Tag
programme.desc:
Die Another Day: Directed by Lee Tamahori. With Pierce Brosnan, Halle Berry, Toby Stephens, Rosamund Pike. James Bond is sent to investigate the connection between a North Korean terrorist and a diamond mogul, who is funding the development of an international space weapon." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0246460/","name":"Die Another Day","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODNkYmIwYTMtYzdhNy00YWE3LThkYmEtNzA5ZTE5YmVjYzZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"James Bond is sent to investigate the connection between a North Korean terrorist and a diamond mogul, who is funding the development of an international space weapon.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0246460/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Colbridge"},"dateCreated":"2021-09-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"It has been knocked by critics and fans a like over the years but on the whole it is hugely entertaining","reviewBody":"I saw this film on it's release in 2002 and several times since, and on a recent viewing in 2021 I was pleased to see it has aged quite well, with this being Pierce Brosnan's 4th film as Bond which he had comfortably grown into by this stage.

It has been knocked by critics and fans a like over the years for some questionable CGI effects and fantastical ideas, like Bond using an invisible car for instance, but on the whole it is hugely entertaining and along with Goldeneye this is Brosnan at his best.

This was the 20th Bond film released 40 years after Dr. No (1962) and the filmmakers clearly decided to pay homage to previous films with the gadgets of Connery's Bond, the playfulness of Lazenby & Moore and the grittiness of Dalton's outings. For fans there are plenty of references to previous Bond films, the most obvious being Diamonds Are Forever (1971), and New Zealand director Lee Tamahori uses some slick visuals to bring Brosnan's Bond bang up to date and throws everything in but the kitchen sink.

Halle Berry is an above average Bond girl who is introduced by rising out of the water in homage to Ursula Andress in Dr. No but it's a shame Michael Madsen isn't given much to do. Judi Dench plays M with dignity once again and there's light relief with John Cleese stepping into the role as Q. Pop star Madonna makes an appearance in one scene after providing the disappointing theme tune, with an awful remix that appears over the end credits, but David Arnold's score is on par with his other Bond scores, although this lacks any thematic qualities to give Die Another Day an identity of it's own and seems to totally ignore the main song which usually gets referenced.

This certainly isn't the best Bond but it is not the worst either as some would like you to believe, although the criticism the film received made the producers Barbara Broccoli and Michael G. Wilson take notice as they let Brosnan go after only his 4th film and decided to reboot the franchise with a much harder edged Bond 4 years later with Daniel Craig.

I always felt Brosnan had at least one more Bond left in him and that his tenure was prematurely cut short. For me he has the best Bond 'look' out of all the actors who has played him but didn't necessarily get the best directors or scripts he deserved to fully flesh out the role. He may have been 47 when this film was made, and fans were quick to allude the initials of the film's title spelled out DAD, meaning the character was no longer hip or relatable to a younger audience, however Daniel Craig was 52 when he filmed his last Bond so age should not have been an issue.

Die Another Day deserves another look and to be re-evaluated, sure it's loud, flashy, full of explosions with some outlandish concepts that pushed fans too far but seen as a tribute to the previous 40 years of Bond it does a fitting job whilst being great entertainment.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":212296,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2003-01-01","keywords":"north korea,iceland,gadget car,british secret service,weaponised car","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Die Another Day","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4225302809","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY3MmU0MjItNTM2Yi00ZDc2LTgzMmYtYTljOTMxNDY3OWZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY3MmU0MjItNTM2Yi00ZDc2LTgzMmYtYTljOTMxNDY3OWZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000112/","name":"Pierce Brosnan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000932/","name":"Halle Berry"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0683253/","name":"Rosamund Pike"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0848414/","name":"Lee Tamahori"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054040/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024134/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001220/","name":"Ian Fleming"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0701031/","name":"Neal Purvis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0905498/","name":"Robert Wade"}],"duration":"PT2H13M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: GoldenEye
James Bond 007: Casino Royale
programme.desc: GoldenEye: Directed by Martin Campbell. With Pierce Brosnan, Sean Bean, Izabella Scorupco, Famke Janssen. Years after a friend and fellow 00 agent is killed on a joint mission, a secret space based weapons program known as "GoldenEye" is stolen. James Bond sets out to stop a Russian crime syndicate from using the weapon." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0113189/","name":"GoldenEye","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk2OTg4MTk1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjExNTgzNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Years after a friend and fellow 00 agent is killed on a joint mission, a secret space based weapons program known as "GoldenEye" is stolen. James Bond sets out to stop a Russian crime syndicate from using the weapon.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0113189/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jbrolly"},"dateCreated":"1999-11-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bond is Back","reviewBody":"Bond is back and better than ever. OK, he may not be better than ever but he's better than he's been in some time. GoldenEye has a great opening scene that is more entertaining than most entire movies. It involves bungee jumping, guns, motorcycles, planes, and nerve gas among other things. Pierce Brosnan's first effort as Bond is a remarkable one. The movie has good acting, good action, and humor. It's great escapism from start to finish. The women are beautiful and Famke Jannsen and Sean Bean play their roles well. GoldenEye also boasts one of the best finales of the series in which Bond must take on the villain atop a gigantic satellite dish. As stated earlier, Brosnan is terrific as Bond. He's suave, witty, charming, looks good in a suit, and has a capacity for action. In conclusion, this is a thrilling Bond from start to finish and should not be missed. Out of 4 stars - 3.5"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":247448,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1995-11-17","keywords":"official james bond series,official bond film,british secret service,cossack,james bond character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"GoldenEye","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2674918169","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzM3MmNmZGQtNzUxYi00N2Q5LTg0YmYtY2ZjMWUwMWFlMWI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzM3MmNmZGQtNzUxYi00N2Q5LTg0YmYtY2ZjMWUwMWFlMWI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from MGM/UA"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000112/","name":"Pierce Brosnan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000293/","name":"Sean Bean"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001713/","name":"Izabella Scorupco"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0132709/","name":"Martin Campbell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054040/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026841/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001220/","name":"Ian Fleming"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0289833/","name":"Michael France"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0128997/","name":"Jeffrey Caine"}],"duration":"PT2H10M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Quantum of Solace
James Bond 007: Ein Quantum Trost
programme.desc:
Quantum of Solace: Directed by Marc Forster. With Daniel Craig, Olga Kurylenko, Mathieu Amalric, Judi Dench. James Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organisation from eliminating a country's most valuable resource." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0830515/","name":"Quantum of Solace","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjZiYTUzMzktZWI5Yy00Mzk4LWFlMDgtYjRmNWU0Mzc0MzNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjUzOTY1NTc@._V1_.jpg","description":"James Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organisation from eliminating a country's most valuable resource.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0830515/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"murtaza_mma"},"dateCreated":"2008-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Potpourri of Vestiges: The Quantum that lacked Solace","reviewBody":"Quantum of Solace or Quantum so less, as some of its critics may call it, definitely lacks certain aspects of a traditional Bond movie. It may be eccentric in the sense that it may not be able to titillate the esoteric Bond fans as it may lack their eclectic style and taste but it definitely succeeds in projecting a new Bond for the contemporary world who may not be a coeval of a superhero, who despite being vulnerable has got the killer instinct in him, which is the very defining characteristic of Ian Fleming's larger than life human incarnate. This Bond goes about his business in a fashion which is far more realistic compared to the Bond of the bygone era with an incredible passion and utmost devotion which is nothing but inexorable. Though Casino Royale was the pioneer of this graduation but its Quantum of Solace that consummates it and gives Fleming's agent a mystique which has always eluded him hitherto, an aura which gives him an opportunity to be mortal and hence a chance to qualify to be called a human.

Quantum of Solace is loaded with mind blowing action sequences which makes it a high octane extravaganza. The pace of the movie is such that you hardly get time to breathe freely. The plot though comparatively weaker than its precursor, is still good enough to keep one guessing thereby keeping one at the edge of the seat, all the way through. 

The only aspect of the movie which should be under the scanner is its editing which is far from just and at times needless and severely annoying. A bit constraint editing under some meticulous vigilance could have done wonders and would have probably helped it, in its quest to be the best Bond movie of all time. 

All being said and given what we have, the movie fails to disappoint the audience and will surely redefine the very prerequisites of an action movie and will definitely serve as a benchmark for the movies in the years to come.

Lucifer
programme.desc:
Lucifer: Created by Tom Kapinos. With Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, D.B. Woodside. Lucifer Morningstar has decided he's had enough of being the dutiful servant in Hell and decides to spend some time on Earth to better understand humanity. He settles in Los Angeles - the City of Angels." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4052886/","name":"Lucifer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJjMzc4NGYtZmFmNS00YWY3LThjMzQtYzJlNGFkZGRiOWI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lucifer Morningstar has decided he's had enough of being the dutiful servant in Hell and decides to spend some time on Earth to better understand humanity. He settles in Los Angeles - the City of Angels.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4052886/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ken-c-225-222484"},"dateCreated":"2015-08-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Why are people so serious about this send up of all things bad?","reviewBody":"Please I've read the moans petitions about how this glorifies Satan.. Sorry but so does Supernatural. Why do people in the US take this stuff so seriously. It a send up OK? Lucifer is witty and charming with fabulous one liners. The plot is terrible. (So are many of Supernaturals... Sorry guys) but we don't watch it for that.. if we believed every series on TV. I'd be walking around with a tin foil hat "Cos Aliens are here" 

Back to the Pilot.... Our British lead Tom Ellis was all suave and smooth like a very old Brandy. Whilst Lauren German was a little Ditsy but his nemesis, but in truth sexy and funny. A future partner in crime.

With myself and a few hundred UK Facebook friends we can't wait for the next episode. Please.. those petitioners who wanted this banned. have you seen it? Did it make you at least chuckle? Still Nope here's a secret, Aliens have landed!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":288763,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2016-01-25","keywords":"devil,female police detective,fallen angel,the devil,lapd","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0255124/","name":"Tom Ellis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0314514/","name":"Lauren German"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1204760/","name":"Kevin Alejandro"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0225724/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0039979/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1093513/","name":"Tom Kapinos"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Season Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2691547161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjdjOTNmMDQtM2Y2Ni00OTg2LTgwYjQtYzBmMTMzZjNmNmM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjdjOTNmMDQtM2Y2Ni00OTg2LTgwYjQtYzBmMTMzZjNmNmM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"All bad things must come to an end. The trials and tribulations of Dr. Martin Ellingham (Martin Clunes), a socially challenged doctor who moves from London to the picturesque village of Port Wenn in Cornwall." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0408381/","name":"Doc Martin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWNmMTAxZTAtNzNhZS00MThhLWJmMmEtYWExZGUzODkxMmM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjExMjk0ODk@._V1_.jpg","description":"The trials and tribulations of Dr. Martin Ellingham (Martin Clunes), a socially challenged doctor who moves from London to the picturesque village of Port Wenn in Cornwall.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0408381/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"pertinaciousbreath","dateCreated":"2009-08-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"This American Says Keep it British!!!","reviewBody":"Doc Martin is as close as it gets to perfection. Martin Clunes and Dominic Minghella should (and I'm sure do) take intense pride over their creation. The writing is the best in the business, the director Ben Bolt is amazing, and the acting is subtle, natural, hilarious and touching. In addition to Martin Clunes, Caroline Catz has shown herself to be one of the best of her generation. And the scenery and music, of course, are beautiful.\n\nPleeeeeeaaaaaaaase, please, please Mr. and Mrs. Clunes: Don't sell out to us Yanks. Let the American version of Men Behaving Badly be your guide...Don't do it, ever, under any circumstances!","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14096,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2004-09-02","keywords":"socially awkward man,doctor,opposites attract,fear of blood,rural setting","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0167340/","name":"Martin Clunes","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0146414/","name":"Caroline Catz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0573862/","name":"Ian McNeice"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103911/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136637/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0591286/","name":"Dominic Minghella","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0189596/","name":"Mark Crowdy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272401/","name":"Craig Ferguson"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Doc Martin: Series 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2606414105","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWU0NDQ5NTctYjJmOC00MmRjLWEwYzItYjNjYzllNTY2YWI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWU0NDQ5NTctYjJmOC00MmRjLWEwYzItYjNjYzllNTY2YWI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Doc Martin: Season 8"</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0408381, Title: Doc Martin, --- Description: Doc Martin: Created by Dominic Minghella, Mark Crowdy, Craig Ferguson. With Martin Clunes, Caroline Catz, Ian McNeice, Joe Absolom. The trials and tribulations of Dr. Martin Ellingham (Martin Clunes), a socially challenged doctor who moves from London to the picturesque village of Port Wenn in Cornwall." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0408381/","name":"Doc Martin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWNmMTAxZTAtNzNhZS00MThhLWJmMmEtYWExZGUzODkxMmM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjExMjk0ODk@._V1_.jpg","description":"The trials and tribulations of Dr. Martin Ellingham (Martin Clunes), a socially challenged doctor who moves from London to the picturesque village of Port Wenn in Cornwall.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0408381/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"pertinaciousbreath","dateCreated":"2009-08-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"This American Says Keep it British!!!","reviewBody":"Doc Martin is as close as it gets to perfection. Martin Clunes and Dominic Minghella should (and I'm sure do) take intense pride over their creation. The writing is the best in the business, the director Ben Bolt is amazing, and the acting is subtle, natural, hilarious and touching. In addition to Martin Clunes, Caroline Catz has shown herself to be one of the best of her generation. And the scenery and music, of course, are beautiful.\n\nPleeeeeeaaaaaaaase, please, please Mr. and Mrs. Clunes: Don't sell out to us Yanks. I would recommend this show to everyone, it sure is a change from the warm fuzzies of television!","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54644,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1994-09-19","keywords":"emergency room,sleeping,medical care,medical doctor,ensemble cast","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000381/","name":"Anthony Edwards","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000123/","name":"George Clooney","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000523/","name":"Julianna Margulies"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093758/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037310/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000341/","name":"Michael Crichton"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Er: Season 15","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2463087897","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDg1YmVhZjEtZmFlMC00NGNiLWIyODgtNjBjNTc2ZTZmNjE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDg1YmVhZjEtZmFlMC00NGNiLWIyODgtNjBjNTc2ZTZmNjE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Er: Season 15"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:

Two FBI agents - one guided by reason, and another by intuition - looking for missing people in Washington, D.C." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0373474/","name":"1-800-Missing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNThjNjBiMmQtNTRlMi00YWEyLWJjMmUtOThkYjcxNDNjMTY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MTYxMzk2._V1_.jpg","description":"Two FBI agents - one guided by reason, and another by intuition - looking for missing people in Washington, D.C.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0373474/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"marisawenzel"},"dateCreated":"2006-03-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Retooling and re-casting ruined the show","reviewBody":"1-800-Missing was an imperfect but enjoyable show.

Sadly, in a counter-productive attempt at helping the show, Lifetime ruined it.

They ruined the look of the show by shooting it on video, giving it a barely-professional look and most importantly, they cast Vivica Fox.

Vivica Fox ruins every scene she is in on that show. She is devoid of any discernible acting ability and grimaces her way through scenes.

It's hard to imagine why they let an excellent actress like Gloria Reuben go, but to replace her with a bad actress like Ms. Fox shows that the show has now reached its creative death.

Maybe it is now so cheap to do (it does look like amateur hour at the local theater!) that they are still shooting it, but really... is there anyone still watching it?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1302,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2003-08-02","keywords":"fbi federal bureau of investigation,female protagonist,scene before opening credits,law enforcement,vision","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0778741/","name":"Caterina Scorsone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000407/","name":"Vivica A. They ruined the look of the show by shooting it on video, giving it a barely-professional look and most importantly, they cast Vivica Fox.

programme.title: Mission évasion
programme.desc: A la fin de la Seconde Guerre mondiale, le lieutenant de l'US Army Thomas Hart est capturé par les Allemands. Il est envoyé dans un camp de prisonniers tenu par le redoutable major Visser. Là, il fait la connaissance du colonel William McNamara, chargé de surveiller tous ses co-détenus, dont il est le plus gradé. Lorsqu'un soldat blanc, raciste, est retrouvé mort dans le camp, le lieutenant Lincoln Scott, officier noir récemment arrivé, est arrêté. Un témoin prétend l'avoir vu commettre le meurtre. Scott doit être jugé et Thomas Hart, ancien étudiant en droit, est chargé de sa défense. William McNamara voit dans la tenue de ce procès une occasion inespérée de planifier une opération d'évasion.

IMDb data; ttnr: 0108757, Title: ER, --- Description: ER: Created by Michael Crichton. With Noah Wyle, Laura Innes, Laura Cerón, Deezer D. The lives, loves and losses of the doctors and nurses of Chicago's County General Hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0108757/","name":"ER","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWQ0YTQ1ZmQtNzk1NC00NzMzLWJjNDYtMDQ0MTcxMThhYTI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives, loves and losses of the doctors and nurses of Chicago's County General Hospital.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0108757/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"julia_rakowski","dateCreated":"2004-03-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"The life and times of doctors at Cook County General Hospital, Chicago.","reviewBody":"The best medical drama ever to be aired! It's fast paced, emotional, and suspenseful. The cast is unbeatable. Composed of some of the best actors and actresses Hollywood has ever seen including George Clooney. The show is extremely realistic down to the smallest detail, yet easy enough to understand. There is a lot of drama, but also some comic relief. The characters are all unique and different, but they work well together on stage. The plots and sub-plots are very diversified, but they all tie in somehow. The writing and coordination is incredible. I would recommend this show to everyone, it sure is a change from the warm fuzzies of television!","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54644,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1994-09-19","keywords":"emergency room,sleeping,medical care,medical doctor,ensemble cast","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000381/","name":"Anthony Edwards","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000123/","name":"George Clooney","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000523/","name":"Julianna Margulies"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093758/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037310/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000341/","name":"Michael Crichton"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Er: Season 15","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2463087897","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDg1YmVhZjEtZmFlMC00NGNiLWIyODgtNjBjNTc2ZTZmNjE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDg1YmVhZjEtZmFlMC00NGNiLWIyODgtNjBjNTc2ZTZmNjE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Er: Season 15"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
1-800-Missing: Created by Glenn Davis, William Laurin. With Caterina Scorsone, Vivica A. Fox, Mark Consuelos, Louis Ferreira. Two FBI agents - one guided by reason, and another by intuition - looking for missing people in Washington, D.C." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0373474/","name":"1-800-Missing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNThjNjBiMmQtNTRlMi00YWEyLWJjMmUtOThkYjcxNDNjMTY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MTYxMzk2._V1_.jpg","description":"Two FBI agents - one guided by reason, and another by intuition - looking for missing people in Washington, D.C.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0373474/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"marisawenzel"},"dateCreated":"2006-03-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Retooling and re-casting ruined the show","reviewBody":"1-800-Missing was an imperfect but enjoyable show.

Sadly, in a counter-productive attempt at helping the show, Lifetime ruined it.

They ruined the look of the show by shooting it on video, giving it a barely-professional look and most importantly, they cast Vivica Fox.

Vivica Fox ruins every scene she is in on that show. She is devoid of any discernible acting ability and grimaces her way through scenes.

It's hard to imagine why they let an excellent actress like Gloria Reuben go, but to replace her with a bad actress like Ms. Fox shows that the show has now reached its creative death.

Maybe it is now so cheap to do (it does look like amateur hour at the local theater!) that they are still shooting it, but really... is there anyone still watching it?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1302,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2003-08-02","keywords":"fbi federal bureau of investigation,female protagonist,scene before opening credits,law enforcement,vision","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0778741/","name":"Caterina Scorsone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000407/","name":"Vivica A. Sadly, in a counter-productive attempt at helping the show, Lifetime ruined it.

They ruined the look of the show by shooting it on video, giving it a barely-professional look and most importantly, they cast Vivica Fox.

Vivica Fox ruins every scene she is in on that show. She is devoid of any discernible acting ability and grimaces her way through scenes.

It's hard to imagine why they let an excellent actress like Gloria Reuben go, but to replace her with a bad actress like Ms. Fox shows that the show has now reached its creative death.

Two FBI agents - one guided by reason, and another by intuition - looking for missing people in Washington, D.C." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0373474/","name":"1-800-Missing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNThjNjBiMmQtNTRlMi00YWEyLWJjMmUtOThkYjcxNDNjMTY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MTYxMzk2._V1_.jpg","description":"Two FBI agents - one guided by reason, and another by intuition - looking for missing people in Washington, D.C.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0373474/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"marisawenzel","dateCreated":"2006-03-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Retooling and re-casting ruined the show","reviewBody":"1-800-Missing was an imperfect but enjoyable show.

Sadly, in a counter-productive attempt at helping the show, Lifetime ruined it.

They ruined the look of the show by shooting it on video, giving it a barely-professional look and most importantly, they cast Vivica Fox.

Vivica Fox ruins every scene she is in on that show. She is devoid of any discernible acting ability and grimaces her way through scenes.

It's hard to imagine why they let an excellent actress like Gloria Reuben go, but to replace her with a bad actress like Ms. Fox shows that the show has now reached its creative death.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: Explorateur, Dirk Pitt recherche depuis des années un cuirassé datant de la guerre de Sécession, qui aurait coulé au large des côtes d'Afrique de l'Ouest. Alors qu'il poursuit ses fouilles, Dirk sauve la vie de la belle Eva, une femme médecin qui enquête sur une mystérieuse pollution qui se répand dans les rivières du Mali. Elle pense que ce mal est lié au navire que recherchent Dirk et son associé Al.
